summary: This is an email chain between attorneys Bobbi C. Sternheim and others regarding the preparation of a joint submission letter for the court in the case of U.S. v. Maxwell. The correspondence discusses drafting and filing a letter, likely concerning defense requests related to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) warden.

keyFacts: The document is legal correspondence from December 1, 2020, among attorneys working on the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
The subject involves preparing a 'joint submission' letter per a court order, specifically regarding a 'defense request re MDC warden.'
The correspondence indicates active legal work on procedural or detention-related matters in Ghislaine Maxwell's case during the COVID-19 pandemic.
